alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 4:48PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Hampshire and central Hampden Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Agawam, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Agawam, West Springfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Easthampton, Longmeadow, Southwick, Granby and Southampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
